task.summary: Sensor, FileSensor, SensorListener, DefaultSensorListener, jnotify for linux, maven configuration to build jar with all deps
triggers and sensors improved, project packages split better, first trigger (MusicIsOnTrigger) implemented. Now it's time to implement trigger manager and actions and to tie it all together.
General refactoring and logical improvement. Triggers' structure established. Configuration objects introduced
Event model fully implemented, tests improved and passing
